name: Feed the cat
description:
Feed the cat is a game created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare #46 (April 2020), for which the theme was "Keep it alive".

By clicking anywhere, you create an explosion that allows you to redirect cans of food to the ground, where your cat will be happy to feed on them, as long as they do not land upside down.

Make sure you keep the cat fed, and feel free to recycle empty cans (through the window), to make it easier for your cat to reach other cans!
